text: company presentations give your
organization a chance to talk to an
interested group of students for 45
minutes you have a classroom dedicated
to your use we help you with the
logistics we set up your media needs we
help set up any paraphernalia that you
want to give to students and we
advertise the events through our student
clubs and on our events calendar to
maximize attendance among interested
students
some organizations choose to do an
off-campus presentation this allows them
to have a longer time block so you can
speak to students for up to an hour and
a half and you can also have catering at
a local hotel if that's something that
is of interest to you
the benefit of doing an on-campus
company presentation is everything is
taken care of for you
so we have students do sign ups we check
students into the presentation so you
have a full list of attendees and if you
want to follow up with them afterwards
it's an easy way to get in touch with
them
